data.title: Independently Brewed in Shiner Texas Since 1909
data.meta_description: Shiner beer has been independently brewed in Shiner, Texas, since 1909. making us the oldest independent brewery. Explore our beers & discover spirits today
data.text:
Our O.G. Lager

Shiner Premium

This traditional, premium golden lager is inspired by our original recipe from 1909. Still the local favorite, our distinctive blonde-style brew has a crisp taste that’s slightly sweet and always refreshing.

First Brewed

1909

Abv

4.4%

Bitterness

13 IBU

Mexican Style Cerveza

Shiner ¡Órale!

This Mexican style cerveza isn’t just a crisp and clean beer brewed with agave, it’s a rallying cry! It’s a way to say “Hi!” “Huh?” and “Hell yes!” to awesome nights ahead.

First Brewed

2022

Abv

4.5%

Bitterness

9 IBU

Cerveza with Lime

Shiner ¡Órale! Limón

“¡Órale!” can mean many different things, but for Texans, it’s what comes to mind when your favorite Mexican-style cerveza adds a bit of all-natural limón for an extra kick of lime flavor.

First Brewed

2024

Abv

4.5%

Bitterness

9 IBU

All Natural, Always Refreshing

Shiner Ruby Redbird

Popping the top on this brew is like slicing into a ripe Texas Ruby Red grapefruit. A bold kick of ginger combines with the citrus for a tart, crisp, and refreshing lager that’s perfect any time of year.

First Brewed

2018

Abv

3.2%

Bitterness

5 IBU

Always in Season

Shiner Prickly Pear

Crisp and tasty lager brewed with cactus fruit. After years of relentless demand, Prickly Pear is finally here to stay and always in season and for the folks who truly love this beer.

First Brewed

2012

Abv

4.9%

Bitterness

12 IBU

Dark as Night

Shiner Black Lager

Unusually smooth for a dark beer, our Bohemian Black Lager is brewed with roasted malts and Czech Saaz and Styrian hops. All else pales in comparison.

First Brewed

2007

Abv

4.9%

Bitterness

18 IBU

Twist of Lime

Shiner Sea Salt & Lime

This sessionable brew is made with real lime peel and artisinal sea salt for an authentic and refreshing flavor. Perfect for outdoor patios, indoor sofas or anywhere you want to sit back and relax.

First Brewed

2020

Abv

4.0%

Bitterness

10 IBU

Heritage Lager

Shiner 1909

Shiner 1909 is a heritage lager made with the same simple ingredients used by our original Shiner brewers. Sip history year-round with this flavorful lager.

First Brewed

2021

Abv

4.5%

Bitterness

20 IBU

Take Non-Alc For A Ride

Shiner Rodeo Golden Brew

Shiner Rodeo Golden Brew is our non-alcoholic take on a classic American lager. It offers crisp malty notes balanced by delicate esters and a gentle hop profile.

First Brewed

2023

Abv

<0.5%

Bitterness

8 IBU

Take Non-Alc For A Ride

Shiner Rodeo Red Amber

Non-Alcoholic styled after an amber ale. It offers a copper-red hue with toasted and caramel notes. It is malt forward but balanced by a gentle hopping.

First Brewed

2024

Abv

<0.5%

Bitterness

12 IBU

Shiner TexHex

Storm Caster Juicy IPA

An endless drought once descended onto the domain of La Bruja. Through a blend of might, magic and experimental hops, the alchemist refreshed her realm with her fabled Storm Caster Juicy IPA.

First Brewed

2023

Abv

5.5%

Bitterness

35 IBU
